[b]Server Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Perfect Switching.[/li] [li]Quick Prayers.[/li] [li]Clan Chat.[/li] [li]Real Pest Control.[/li] [li]Zombie's Mini-Game.[/li] [li]10+ Bosses.[/li] [li]Perfect Curses.[/li] [li]Hand Cannon With Working Special.[/li] [li]Chaotics.[/li] [li]Torva, Pernix, and Virtus.[/li] [li]Korasi Sword With Working Special.[/li] [li]All Skills Working.[/li] [li]Vote4Rewards System.[/li] [li]Auto-Donation System.[/li] [li]New Hitmarks.[/li] [li]Full Screen Client.[/li] [li]Constant Updates.[/li] [li]Multiple Worlds Will Be Added As Server Grows (Login Server).[/li][/ul]

item.title: Rune-Requiem 317
item.dc:creator: @revanet revanet
item.description:
@revanet wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:2, topic:460884”]This looks good, mate. The only two things i’m not a big fan of (one being forum-wise, the other server-wise) are the donator points. I don’t like servers that give advantages to those who donate. Others may disagree, just note, this is merely an opinion.
The second thing being the forums, they look to… bland, I guess you could say. Do you plan on ‘revamping’ them anytime soon?

Hopefully I don’t sound like a complete ass.[/quote]
Eventually we might switch to a model that doesn’t require donations, or to one where you pay $5 a month to access world 2. As for the forums, not as of right now; probably as we grow and I can bother to purchase new forum software + gfx artist. Thanks for the suggestions!

Read full topic

item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

This looks good, mate. The only two things i’m not a big fan of (one being forum-wise, the other server-wise) are the donator points. I don’t like servers that give advantages to those who donate. Others may disagree, just note, this is merely an opinion.
The second thing being the forums, they look to… bland, I guess you could say. Do you plan on ‘revamping’ them anytime soon?

Hopefully I don’t sound like a complete ass.

Read full topic
